heroSubtitle: Secure, manage, and access your passwords and sensitive information from anywhere. VaultCloud provides end-to-end encryption in a simple, elegant interface.
whySubtitle: Everything you need in a modern password manager.
feature1Desc: Your data is encrypted and decrypted only on your devices. We never have access to your master password or vault data.
feature2Desc: Access your vault on any device, anywhere. Your data stays in sync automatically.
feature3Desc: Safely share credentials and notes with your team or family members (coming soon).
title: Title
twoFactorAuthDesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
securityKeysDesc: Use hardware security keys for passwordless login and enhanced account protection.
registerSecurityKeyDesc: Insert your security key and follow the prompts to register it with your account.
touchYourKey: Touch your security key when it blinks.
nameYourKey: Give your security key a name
allowPasswordLoginDesc: When disabled, you can only login using security keys. You must have at least one security key registered to disable password login.
mustHaveSecurityKey: You must register at least one security key before disabling password login.
signInToAccess: Sign in to access your vault
magicLinkSent: A magic link has been sent to {email}. Click the link to sign in.
siteSettingsDescription: Configure global settings for your VaultCloud instance.
registrationSettingsDescription: Control whether new users can register for accounts.
allowRegistrationDescription: When disabled, new users cannot register. Only administrators can create accounts.
emailVerificationSettingsDescription: Require email verification for new accounts using Resend API.
enableEmailVerificationDescription: New users must verify their email address before accessing their account.
resendApiKeyDescription: Enter your Resend API key to enable email verification. Get your key at resend.com.
resendApiKeyNote: Important: Keep your API key secure
resendApiKeyNoteDescription: Your Resend API key is stored securely and is only accessible to administrators. Never share this key publicly.
resendApiKeyRequired: Resend API key is required when email verification is enabled.
